resources.string: WELCOME TO THE UTECH MEDICAL CENTER
Do you or anyone in your household have Covid-19?
Are you waiting for a Covid-19 test or test result?
Do you or anyone in our household have a continuous cough?
Do you or anyone in our household have a loss of taste or smell?
Do you or anyone in our household have a high temperature or fever?
Have you travelled in the past 14 days to any regions affected by covid-19?
Have you been in contact with anyone that travelled in the past 14 days?
Do you or anyone in your household have any other flu-like symptoms, such as gastrointestial upset, headache or fatigue?
Do you live with someone who has either tested positive for Covid-19 or had symptoms of Covid-19 in the last 14 days??
Do you or anyone in your household have, or has had, possible or confirmed Covid-19 or had symptoms of Covid-19 in the last 14 days?
Do you have heart disease, lung disease, diabetes or any auto-immune disorders?
Place your sanitized index finger on the sensor
